towerhandlers Tenders
==================================

### Tenders
---------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-428-75917574
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-242312/A
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-12-15
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-15T14:00:00
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Tender Description
--------------------

* **Items Required:**
	+ CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia: 9 units of TRANSMITTER, LIQUID QUANTITY (NATO Stock Number: 01-101-6453, Part Number: 45271, GEMS SENSORS INC.)
	+ CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia: 3 units of TRANSMITTER, LIQUID QUANTITY (NATO Stock Number: 01-101-6453, Part Number: 45271, GEMS SENSORS INC.)
	+ CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia: 9 units of TRANSMITTER, LIQUID QUANTITY (NATO Stock Number: 01-396-2717, Part Number: 124303, GEMS SENSORS INC.)
	+ CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia: 7 units of TRANSMITTER, LIQUID QUANTITY (NATO Stock Number: 01-396-2717, Part Number: 124303, GEMS SENSORS INC.)
* **Bidding Requirements:**
	+ Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
	+ Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.
	+ Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly indicated, including brand name, model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.
* **Documents:**
	+ Available in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
------------------

* **Name:** Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit
* **Email:** [Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

--------------------
